archy
=====

Render nested hierarchies `npm ls` style with unicode pipes.

[![build status](https://secure.travis-ci.org/substack/node-archy.png)](http://travis-ci.org/substack/node-archy)

example
=======

``` js
var archy = require('archy');
var s = archy({
  label : 'beep',
  nodes : [
    'ity',
    {
      label : 'boop',
      nodes : [
        {
          label : 'o_O',
          nodes : [
            {
              label : 'oh',
              nodes : [ 'hello', 'puny' ]
            },
            '
